text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in https://ada.org/ToothNumberingSystem-TEMPORARY-WAITING-FOR-HTA-DEFINED-URL
  • Include all codes defined in https://ada.org/OralCavityCode-TEMPORARY-WAITING-FOR-HTA-DEFINED-URL

name: OralBodySite
title: Oral Body Site Value Set
description: Oral Body Site indicating tooth numbers and area of oral cavity.
